name: Isekaied - The Hero that Saved the World!
name_original: Isekaied - The Hero that Saved the World!
description:
In this short adventure, The Princess and the King have been kidnapped by something or someone!

It is your job, as a newcomer to this strange medieval world, to help the locals find them. 

Talk to the locals to get hints and lore about the world you're in.

Save the princess!

(And yes... She is on this castle!)

This game is the first I've launched. Reviews, suggestions or critics will be welcome! Help me improve!

Thank you for trying the game!
